headline: American Airlines Delays Pile Up After Technical Issue
summary: American Airlines  saw flight delays but avoided a deeper Christmas Eve meltdown after a vendor technology issue briefly halted its operation Tuesday morning.  Only 13 of American’s mainline flights had been canceled, however.  About one-third of flights at Envoy, American’s regional airline subsidiary, were also delayed and 17 were canceled.

raw.headline: American Airlines Delays Pile Up After Technical Issue
raw.summary: American Airlines  saw flight delays but avoided a deeper Christmas Eve meltdown after a vendor technology issue briefly halted its operation Tuesday morning.  Only 13 of American’s mainline flights had been canceled, however.  About one-third of flights at Envoy, American’s regional airline subsidiary, were also delayed and 17 were canceled.

headline: American Airlines Says Flights Resuming After Technical Issue
summary: American Airlines  said its flights had resumed after a vendor technology issue briefly led the carrier to halt them Tuesday morning, on a high-pressure day for holiday travel.  The Federal Aviation Administration shortly before 8 a.m. ET canceled a ground stop that had been issued earlier for all American flights at the carrier’s request.  While some American flights got off to a late start Tuesday morning, the hourlong ground stop hadn’t resulted in mass cancellations, according to Cirium, an airline data provider.

headline: CrowdStrike: A Masterclass In Innovation And Sales
summary: CrowdStrike recently surpassed over $1 billion in quarterly sales for the first time in its history. Click here to find out why I rate CRWD stock a strong buy.
